column4: guys is there a way to built a VM of an existing windows installation from anotehr Disk? so i could boot it into some vmplayer inside ubuntu?
Line_: ok, ill search for it. ty btw, i was finding old results on google
check into VMware Converter I think that will do what you looking for, although it's VMware not Virtualbox
I found a how to for VirtualBox also: http://www.sysprobs.com/physical-virtual-virtualbox-virtualbox-p2v
